title: Help cant leave base
body: I just had a game where in the beginning of the game I could not leave my fountain and because of this I had to restart. And when i restarted it took me foreve to connect to the game and now i'm being punished for it by being in a low priority queue

replies.body:
The [leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally because a disconnection negatively impacts the game for all players, regardless of the reason for the disconnection. For this reason, Leaverbuster penalties cannot be modified or removed.

 It sounds like you may be experiencing an unstable connection to the game servers. When you have an unstable connection, it can prevent you from taking actions in game or prevent you from connecting at all. There are a number of factors that would cause this, and the most common solutions can be found in our [connection knowledge base.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if these steps helped.
